mapper.insert: insert into lg_waybill (wayBillId, departureTime, vehicleOperationId, viaCompany, carrierCompany, contentShipment, accountingTotalCost, contractFreight, prepayment, balanceSettlementMethod, arrivalTime, mileage, vehicleOrigin, vehicleArrival, wayBillStatus, remarks, goodsValuation, remarks1, remarks2) values (#{waybillid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departuretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vehicleoperationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viacompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carriercompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentshipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountingtotalcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{contractfreight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{prepayment,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{balancesettlementmethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arrivaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vehicleorigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclearrival,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsvaluation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_waybill set departureTime = #{departuretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vehicleOperationId = #{vehicleoperationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, viaCompany = #{viacompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carrierCompany = #{carriercompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contentShipment = #{contentshipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accountingTotalCost = #{accountingtotalcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, contractFreight = #{contractfreight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, prepayment = #{prepayment,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, balanceSettlementMethod = #{balancesettlementmethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrivalTime = #{arrivaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mileage = #{mileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, vehicleOrigin = #{vehicleorigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicleArrival = #{vehiclearrival,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wayBillStatus = #{waybillstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsValuation = #{goodsvaluation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where wayBillId = #{waybillid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select wayBillId, departureTime, vehicleOperationId, viaCompany, carrierCompany, contentShipment, accountingTotalCost, contractFreight, prepayment, balanceSettlementMethod, arrivalTime, mileage, vehicleOrigin, vehicleArrival, wayBillStatus, remarks, goodsValuation, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_waybill where wayBillId = #{waybillid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
